contents.content:
[{"MessageType": 1,"Content": "Hello Simon, it's been a while
If you see this message, can you reply to me...?","Avatar": "cherry_os_01","Time": "AM 06:59"},{"MessageType": 1,"Content": "...I know you may not have forgiven me yet 
But I do have something important that I want to tell you. If you see this, please call me back...","Avatar": "cherry_os_01","Time": "PM 11:32"}]

[{"MessageType": 1,"Content": "Simon久しぶり
メッセージ見たら返信して欲しい…","Avatar": "cherry_os_01","Time": "AM 06:59"},{"MessageType": 1,"Content": "…まだあたしのこと怒ってんだろうね
でも大事な用事があるんだ
電話待ってる","Avatar": "cherry_os_01","Time": "PM 11:32"}]

[{"MessageType": 1,"Content": "嗨 Simon 好久不見
看到訊息可以回覆我嗎...?","Avatar": "cherry_os_01","Time": "AM 06:59"},{"MessageType": 1,"Content": "...我知道你可能還沒原諒我
不過我是有別的重要的事情想跟你說 看到請打給我...","Avatar": "cherry_os_01","Time": "PM 11:32"}]

[{"MessageType": 1,"Content": "Simon 오랜만이야
이거 보면 답장해줄 수 있어...?","Avatar": "cherry_os_01","Time": "AM 06:59"},{"MessageType": 1,"Content": "나도 알아... 네가 아직 날 용서하지 않았다는걸.
그래도 정말 중요한 일로 네게 할 말이 있어. 이거 보면 전화 좀 부탁할게...","Avatar": "cherry_os_01","Time": "PM 11:32"}]

[{"MessageType": 1,"Content": "嗨 Simon 好久不見
看到訊息可以回覆我嗎...?","Avatar": "cherry_os_01","Time": "AM 06:59"},{"MessageType": 1,"Content": "...我知道你可能還沒原諒我
不過我是有別的重要的事情想跟你說 看到請打給我...","Avatar": "cherry_os_01","Time": "PM 11:32"}]

[{"MessageType": 1,"Content": "嗨 Simon 好久不见
看到讯息可以回覆我吗...?","Avatar": "cherry_os_01","Time": "AM 06:59"},{"MessageType": 1,"Content": "...我知道你可能还没原谅我
不过我是有别的重要的事情想跟你说 看到请打给我...","Avatar": "cherry_os_01","Time": "PM 11:32"}]
